resources.string: [File] %1$s(%2$s) \nDownload files in Android is not supported yet.
The server runs on version "%1$s", while your client runs on version "%2$s". Do you want to download new version?
\"The server runs on version "%1$s", while your client runs on version "%2$s".\nThe two versions are not compatible with each other.\nDo you want to download a new version?\"
